awd_titl_txt: Tectonic and Petrologic Features of the Siberian Plate      During the Precambrian
awd_abstract_narration: Western knowledge of major Precambrian tectonic and lithologic           elements in the basement of the Silurian plate is limited, although             considerable data on that geology exists in the (former) USSR.                  This action provides support for O.M. Rosen, an expert on the                   Siberian plate, to collaborate with workers at the New Mexico                   Institute of Mining and Technology in evaluating and analyzing much             of the existing information.  Results should provide a compilation              of relevant data and several manuscripts that will be of                        considerable value to western workers in the Arctic basin including             Alaska.

inst.inst_name: New Mexico Institute of Mining and Technology
inst.org_lgl_bus_name: NEW MEXICO INSTITUTE OF MINING AND TECHNOLOGY
